#summary Introducing the market data collector
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

  * Download and serialize yahoo market data into a MySQL database.
  * The technology used is *core Java* with *Maven*.
  * Costless ( an old Linux server with some hard drive space should be sufficient ).

= Details =

The goals is to extract market data information from the yahoo website and serialized them into a MySQL database. ( could be used as an analysis/strategies tester database )

In the first steps it will include :
  * To retrieve yahoo market data from the internet.
  * To build a front end to manage the application.

The details to download market data could be found [http://www.gummy-stuff.org/Yahoo-data.htm here].
